mutants.code:
import re

def count_syllables(string):
    count = 1
    regex = '[aiouy]+e*|e(?!d$|ly).|[td]ed|le$|les$'
    words = re.split('[\\s.,;!?]+', string)
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        syllables = re.findall(regex, word)
        count += len(syllables)
    return count

import re

def count_syllables(string):
    count = -1
    regex = '[aiouy]+e*|e(?!d$|ly).|[td]ed|le$|les$'
    words = re.split('[\\s.,;!?]+', string)
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        syllables = re.findall(regex, word)
        count += len(syllables)
    return count

import re

def count_syllables(string):
    count = 0
    regex = ''
    words = re.split('[\\s.,;!?]+', string)
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        syllables = re.findall(regex, word)
        count += len(syllables)
    return count

import re

def count_syllables(string):
    count = 0
    regex = '[aiouy]+e*|e(?!d$|ly).|[td]ed|le$|les$'
    words = re.split('[\\s.,;!?]+', string)
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        syllables = re.findall(regex, word)
        count -= len(syllables)
    return count

import re

def count_syllables(string):
    count = 0
    regex = '[aiouy]+e*|e(?!d$|ly).|[td]ed|le$|les$'
    words = re.split('', string)
    for word in words:
        word = word.lower()
        syllables = re.findall(regex, word)
        count += len(syllables)
    return count
